title: Track Production Budget Overages
description: A line producer needs to check if any department in a film production is over budget.

tasks.description: Retrieve the current budget and spending data for all production departments.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls a complete report of budgeted vs. actual spending.

tasks.description: Analyze the data to identify any departments that are over budget.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that the 'Special Effects' department is 15% over budget.

tasks.description: Notify the line producer and the head of the special effects department of the budget variance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a clear notification about the budget overage.
